about_the_game:
READ, REMEMBER, and WRITE words in a sequence, adhering to a simple rule: the word must begin with the same letter that the previous word ended with. A competitive word battle.



Strategically build your list of words, strive for the longest ones, try getting bonus points, and remember opponents' words, which you can cleverly incorporate into future games.



Scores are determined by evaluating several factors, including the quantity of legitimate words played, the length of each word, and any unsuccessful attempts made during a player's turn.



Whether you prefer solo play for practicing English words or competing against friends, Word Relay offers an exciting gaming experience.

Game Features


  • Unique games with changing bonus rules
  • Customizable games to play how you want
  • Attack or defend with strategic wordplay
  • Opportunity to learn new words within each game

short_description: Read, Remember and Write! Read what others write. Remember because you cannot reuse words. Write a word on your turn that starts with the previous word's ending letter. Outsmart your opponents using bonus rules. Watch out, time is running short!
